title: Wrong Marriage, Right Love - Novel Updates

tags: Abusive Characters   Acting   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Businessmen   Celebrities   Confinement   Family   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Identities   Parent Complex   Pregnancy   R*pe   Sadistic Characters   Secret Identity   S*x S*aves   Unrequited Love   Younger Love Interests

description: Gu Feiyan and Gu Mingzhu‘s identities were mistaken due to a conspiracy. Gu Feiyan who should actually continue the family line was never loved by her parents since the day she returned home. What she went through was endless depression and suffer. No one cared about her. Gu Mingzhu, on the contrary, replaced her and took away everything from her.>
